info.title: Ringg AI API Documentation
info.description: This is the documentation for the Ringg AI APIs. The Ringg AI API follows RESTful principles, making it intuitive and easy to integrate with your applications. All API requests should be made to the base URL. The API accepts and returns data in JSON format. Ensure your requests include the appropriate Content-Type header for POST and PATCH requests.

tags.name: calling
tags.description: Endpoints for making and managing calls.

get.description: Retrieves information about your current workspace.

200.description: Successful Response: Information about the current workspace.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users in your current workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of users in the workspace.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available phone numbers in your workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of available phone numbers.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all workspaces accessible to the current user.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of user workspaces.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

patch.description: Regenerates a new API key for the current workspace.

parameters.name: X-API-KEY
parameters.description: (Required) Your current Ringg AI API key.

200.description: Successful Response: New API key generated.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available assistants in your workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of assistants.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available voices for assistants, optionally filtered by language.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Filter voices by language (e.g., 'en-US', 'hi-IN'). Multiple languages can be comma-separated.

200.description: Successful Response: A list of available voices.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

patch.description: Updates an existing assistant with new configuration settings. Each operation requires specific fields to be provided.

oneOf.example: You are a helpful sales assistant.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format.

detail.example: Selected voice does not support the specified language

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific assistant by its ID.

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: (Required) ID of the assistant to retrieve.

200.description: Successful Response: Detailed information about the assistant.

example.agent_prompt: You are a helpful sales assistant.
example.intro_message: Hello! I'm calling from Ringg AI.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

delete.description: Deletes an assistant by archiving it (soft delete).

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: (Required) ID of the assistant to delete.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

post.description: Starts a new individual outbound call to a specified recipient. The from_number field is required and should be a valid phone number with country code.

name.description: The name of the person to call

agent_id.description: UUID of the agent that will handle the call

from_number.description: The phone number to call from (with country code)

custom_args_values.description: Custom variables that will be replaced in the agent's prompt using @{{variable_name}} syntax

callback_url.description: Webhook URL to receive call status updates and analysis results. Callbacks are sent when call status changes (completed, failed, etc.) and when analysis is complete.

callback_args.description: Additional arguments for the webhook callback

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers for the webhook request.

Content-Type.description: Content type for the webhook request

params.description: URL query parameters to append to the callback URL. These are added as ?key=value pairs to the webhook URL.

retry_not_picked.description: Minutes to wait if not picked (default: 30)

200.description: Successful Response: Details about the initiated call.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves the history of calls made through the Ringg AI platform.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter calls starting from this date (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter calls up to this date (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of calls to return (default: 10).

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the results as a CSV file.

parameters.name: bulk_list_id
parameters.description: Filter calls by bulk list ID.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific call using its unique identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (Required) The unique identifier (UUID) of the call.

404.description: Not Found - The call does not exist.

delete.description: Deletes a contact list and all associated contacts by list ID.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the contact list to delete.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

404.description: Not Found - Contact list not found.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all campaigns for the current user.

parameters.name: call_count
parameters.description: Whether to include call count for each campaign.

post.description: Initiates a new campaign with the specified configuration.
Uploads a contact list for a campaign. Accepts a CSV file and campaign configuration as form data.

variables_map.description: (Required) JSON string mapping variable names to columns.

file.description: (Required) CSV file containing the contact list.

200.description: Contact list uploaded and campaign saved successfully.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or file.

patch.description: Terminates active (registered/retry) calls at different levels: all calls for an agent, specific calls by call IDs, all calls within a campaign, specific calls within a campaign by mobile numbers, or all calls associated with mobile numbers.

agent_id.description: Terminate all active calls for a specific agent

call_ids.description: Array of specific call IDs to terminate

campaign_id.description: Campaign ID to terminate all calls within a campaign

mobile_numbers.description: Array of mobile numbers to terminate calls for (max 100). Can be used with campaign_id or alone for individual calls
